|name                = 캔디스

<!-- Hello -->
|vo_01_01_title      = 첫 만남…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = 멀리서 온 여행자여, 사막 밤길은 험난하니 이곳에서 하룻밤 머물고 가. 내가 너의 꿈 없는 밤을 돌봐줄게
|vo_01_01_rm         = Meolliseo on yeohaengjayeo, samak bamgireun heomnanhani igoseseo harutbam meomulgo ga. Naega geudae-ui kkum eomneun bameul dolbwajulge
|vo_01_01_tl         = Traveler from afar, the desert night road is rough, so stay here for a night. I'll take care of your dreamless night.

<!-- Chats -->
|vo_02_01_title      = 잡담・방패와 창
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: Spear and Shield
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Spear and Shield.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = 방패만으로는 소중한 것을 지킬 수 없어서 창을 들게 됐어
|vo_02_01_rm         = Bangpaemaneuroneun sojunghan geoseul jikil su eopsseoseo chang'eul deulge dwaesseo
|vo_02_01_tl         = I couldn't protect my precious things with just a shield, so I started using a spear.

|vo_02_02_title      = 잡담・삶
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Life
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Life.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = 모두가 평온한 삶을 유지할 수 있다면, 난 그걸로 만족해…
|vo_02_02_rm         = Moduga pyeong'onhan salmeul yujihal su itdamyeon, nan geugeollo manjokhae...
|vo_02_02_tl         = If everyone can keep a peaceful life, I'm satisfied with that...

|vo_02_03_title      = 잡담・소원
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: Wishes
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Wishes.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = 어떤 방법으로든 소중한 것을 수호해낼 거야. 그게… 과분한 소원이라 할지라도
|vo_02_03_rm         = Eotteon bangbeobeurodeun sojunghan geoseul suhohaenael geoya. Geuge... gwabunhan sowonira haljirado
|vo_02_03_tl         = I will protect things that are precious to me in any way. Even though... it's an undeserved wish.

<!-- Weather -->
|vo_03_01_title      = 비가 올 때…
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = 감기 조심해
|vo_03_01_rm         = Gamgi josimhae
|vo_03_01_tl         = Be careful of catching a cold.

|vo_03_02_title      = 번개가 칠 때…
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = When Thunder Strikes
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = 천둥소리가 무섭니?
|vo_03_02_rm         = Cheondungsoriga museopni?
|vo_03_02_tl         = Are you scared of the sound of thunder?

|vo_03_03_title      = 눈이 올 때…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When It Snows
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = 이 하얀 것들은, 정말 차갑네…
|vo_03_03_rm         = I hayan geotdeureun, jeongmal chagapne...
|vo_03_03_tl         = These white things are really cold...

|vo_03_04_title      = 강풍이 불 때…
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When the Wind Is Blowing
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Wind Is Blowing.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = 사막에선 이런 바람이 모래폭풍을 일으키니 조심해야 해
|vo_03_04_rm         = Samageseon ireon barami moraepokpung'eul ireukini josimhaeya hae
|vo_03_04_tl         = In the desert, this kind of wind causes sandstorms, so be careful.

|vo_03_05_title      = 사막에 있을 때…
|vo_03_05_subtitle   = In the Desert
|vo_03_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} In the Desert.ogg
|vo_03_05_tx         = 내가 곁에 있으니까, 불안하면 내 손을 꼭 잡아
|vo_03_05_rm         = Naega gyeote isseunikka, buranhamyeon nae soneul kkok jaba
|vo_03_05_tl         = Since I'm by your side, if you're nervous, hold my hand tightly.

<!-- Greetings -->
|vo_04_01_title      = 아침 인사…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = 좋은 아침이야, 어젯밤은 잘 잤어?
|vo_04_01_rm         = Joeun achimiya, eojetbameun jal jasseo?
|vo_04_01_tl         = Good morning, did you sleep well tonight?

|vo_04_02_title      = 점심 인사…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = 벌써 점심이네. 햇볕이 따가우니까 그늘진 곳에서 쉬는 게 좋겠어
|vo_04_02_rm         = Beolsseo jeomsimine. Haetbyeochi ttagaunikka geuneuljin goseseo swineun ge jokesseo
|vo_04_02_tl         = It's already lunchtime. Since the sunlight is too strong, it would be better to rest at a shady spot.

|vo_04_03_title      = 저녁 인사…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = 밤이구나. 어둠 속에는 말 못 할 비밀이 얼마나 숨겨져 있을까…
|vo_04_03_rm         = Bamiguna. Eodum sogeneun mal mot hal bimiri eolmana sumgyeojyeo isseulkka...
|vo_04_03_tl         = It's night. How many unspeakable secrets would be hidden in the dark...

|vo_04_04_title      = 굿나잇…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = 벌써 자야 할 시간이네. 먼저 자. 밤은 아름다운 만큼 치명적이니까 내가 불침번을 서 줄게
|vo_04_04_rm         = Beolsseo jaya hal siganine. Meonjeo ja. Bameun areumdaun mankeun chimyeongjeoginikka naega bulchimbeoneul seo julge
|vo_04_04_tl         = It's already time to sleep. You sleep first. The night is as deadly as it is beautiful, so I'll keep a night watch.

<!-- About -->
|vo_05_01_title      = {name} 자신에 대해・눈동자 색
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}: Eye Color
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Eye Color.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = 이상해 보여? 호박색이나 푸른색이나, 다 흔한 색 아닌가…
|vo_05_01_rm         = Isanghae boyeo? Hobakseagina pureunsaegina, da heunhan seak aninga...
|vo_05_01_tl         = You think it's weird? Amber or blue, aren't they all common colors...

|vo_05_02_title      = {name} 자신에 대해・아루 마을
|vo_05_02_subtitle   = About {character}: [[Aaru Village]]
|vo_05_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Aaru Village.ogg
|vo_05_02_tx         = 아루 마을에서 태어나 자란 나는, 어렸을 때부터 할아버지의 수호자 자리를 물려받기로 정해졌지… 하지만 지금은 내가 기꺼이 받아들인 천직이 됐어
|vo_05_02_rm         = Aru Maeureseo taeeona jaran naneun, eoryeosseul ttaebuteo harabeoji-ui suhoja jarireul mullyeobatgiro jeonghaejyeotji... hajiman jigeumeun naega gikkeoi badadeurin cheonjigi dwaesseo
|vo_05_02_tl         = Born and raised in Aaru Village, I was chosen to inherit my grandfather's guardian role since I was young... but now it's a vocation I'm willing to accept.

|vo_05_03_title      = {name} 자신에 대해・부모님
|vo_05_03_friendship = 4
|vo_05_03_subtitle   = About {character}: Parents
|vo_05_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Parents.ogg
|vo_05_03_tx         = 아카데미아 학자였던 아버지는 연구를 위해 아루 마을에 왔다가 어머니와 만나셨지. 어머니에 대한 일은 다 아버지한테서 들은 거야…. 내가 태어난 날에 영원한 밤으로 떠나셨거든…
|vo_05_03_rm         = Akademia hakjayeotdeon abeojineun yeongureul wihae Aru Maeure watdaga eomeoniwa mannasyeotji. Eomonie daehan ireun da abeojihanteseo deureun geoya.... Naega taeeonan nare yeong'wonhan bameuro tteonasyeotgeodeun...
|vo_05_03_tl         = My father, an Akademiya scholar, came to Aaru village for research and met my mother. I heard everything about my mother from my father.... She left for eternal night on the day I was born...

<!-- About Us -->
|vo_06_01_title      = 우리에 대해・귀한 손님
|vo_06_01_quest      = King Deshret and the Three Magi
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Hosting Guests
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Hosting Guests.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = 넌 아루 마을의 영원한 귀빈이야. 여행하면서 지치거나 힘들 땐 언제든지 쉬었다 가. 아루 마을과 난… 영원히 널 환영해
|vo_06_01_rm         = Neon Aru Maeul-ui yeong'wonhan gwibiniya. Yeohaenghamyeonseo jichigeona himdeul ttaen eonjedeunji swieotda ga. Aru Maeulgwa nan... yeong'wonhi neol hwanyeonghae
|vo_06_01_tl         = You are forever the guest of Aaru Village. If you are tired or exhausted during your travels, come and rest here anytime. Aaru Village and I... welcome you forever.

|vo_06_02_title      = 우리에 대해・보물함
|vo_06_02_friendship = 6
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Treasure in the Chest
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Treasure in the Chest.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = 누구나 마음속에 소중한 것을 담은 보물함을 품고 있고, 평생 그것을 수호하지. 내 보물함 속에는 뭐가 들어있는지 맞혀볼래?
|vo_06_02_rm         = Nuguna maeumsoge sojunghan geoseul dameun bomulhameul pumgo itgo, pyeongsaeng geugeoseul suhohaji. Nae bomulham sogeneun mwoga deureoitneunji machyeobollae?
|vo_06_02_tl         = Everyone has a treasure box with something precious inside their hearts, and they protect it forever. Do you want to guess what's in my treasure box?

<!-- Miscellany I -->
|vo_07_01_title      = 「신의 눈」에 대해…
|vo_07_01_friendship = 4
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = 내가 「신의 눈」을 얻었을 때 마을 사람들은 모두 아흐마르의 은혜라고 했지…. 하지만 나에겐 별로 중요치 않은 사실이야. 난 신의 은혜가 있든 없든 「수호자」의 책임을 다할 거니까
|vo_07_01_rm         = Naega "Sin-ui Nun"eul eodeosseul ttae maeul saramdeureun modu Aheumareu-ui eunhyerago haetji.... Hajiman naegen byeollo jung'yochi anneun sasiriya. Nan sin-ui eunhyega itdeun eopdeun "Suhoja"ui chaegimeul dahal geonikka
|vo_07_01_tl         = When I got my "Vision", the villagers all said it was a blessing from Ahmar... but it isn't an important fact to me. Whether there is a blessing from God or not, I will fulfill my responsibility as a "Protector".

|vo_07_02_title      = 하고 싶은 이야기…
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = 난 아루 마을에서 지내는 게 좋아. 그리고 내 방심과 불찰이 지금의 삶을 파괴해버릴 수 있다는 사실에 경각심을 갖고 있지
|vo_07_02_rm         = Nan Aru Maeureseo jinaeneun ge joa. Geurigo nae bangsimgwa bulchari jigeum-ui salmeul pagoehaebeoril su itdaneun sasire gyeonggaksimeul gatgo itji
|vo_07_02_tl         = I like staying in Aaru Village. And I am aware that my carelessness and inattention can destroy the life I am living now.

|vo_07_03_title      = 흥미있는 일…
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = 대추야자를 본 적이 있어? 마을 사람들은 그걸 사탕으로 만들어 먹는데, 정말 달고 맛있어, 관심 있으면 너도 한번 먹어봐
|vo_07_03_rm         = Daechuyajareul bon jeogi isseo? Maeul saramdeureun geugeol satang'euro mandeureo meokneunde, jeongmal dalgo masisseo, gwansim isseumyeon neodo hanbeon meogeobwa
|vo_07_03_tl         = Have you ever seen Date Palms? The villagers make it to candies, it's really sweet and delicious, you should try it if you're interested.

<!-- About Teammates -->
|vo_08_01_title      = 작은 쿠사나리 화신에 대해…
|vo_08_01_friendship = 4
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Lesser Lord Kusanali]]
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Lesser Lord Kusanali.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = 아흐마르의 혈통을 이어받은 내가 이곳에서 살아남은 건, 그녀의 자비 덕분이겠지. 고맙지만, 어찌 됐든 난 사막의 딸이야…
|vo_08_01_rm         = Aheumareu-ui hyeoltong'eul ieobadeun naega igoseseo saranameun geon, geunyeo-ui jabi deokbunigetji. Gomapjiman, eojji dwaetdeun nan samak-ui ttariya...
|vo_08_01_tl         = The reason that I, a person who is a descendant of Ahmar's bloodline, would be thanks to her mercy. I am grateful, but anyways, I am a daughter of the desert...

|vo_08_02_title      = 레일라에 대해…
|vo_08_02_friendship = 4
|vo_08_02_quest      = Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Layla]]
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Layla.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = 「몽유병 걸린 이상한 소녀」라… 방사벽 근처에서 본 적이 있어. 이해할 수 없는 얘기를 하거나 서식을 작성하곤 했지…. 그러면 기분이 나아아보이던데, 어쩌면 그녀만의 스트레스 해소법일지도 모르겠네
|vo_08_02_rm         = 
|vo_08_02_tl         = 

|vo_08_03_title      = 알하이탐에 대해…
|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Alhaitham]]
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Alhaitham.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = 이상한 수메르 학자였어, 그의 생각과 견해는 독특하고 예리했지…. 그 예리함이 아루 마을에 해를 끼치지 않았으면 좋겠어
|vo_08_03_rm         = Isanghan Sumereu hakjayeosseo, geu-ui saenggakgwa gyeonhaeneun dokteukhago yerihaetji.... Geu yerihami Aru Maeure haereul kkichiji annasseumyeon jokesseo
|vo_08_03_tl         = He was a weird Sumeru scholar, his thoughts and opinions were unique and sharp... I hope the sharpness does not give harm to Aaru Village.

|vo_08_04_title      = 사이노에 대해…
|vo_08_04_friendship = 4
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Cyno]]
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Cyno.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = 아카데미아의 대풍기관은 방사벽 이쪽에 자주 오지 않는데, 요즘은 종종 보이더라고. 도금 여단에선 그에 대한 무서운 전설이 퍼지고 있어…
|vo_08_04_rm         = Akademia-ui Daepunggigwaneun bangsabyeok ijjoge jaju oji anneunde, yojeuneun jongjong boideorago. Dogeum yeodaneseon geue daehan museoun jeonseol-i peojigo isseo...
|vo_08_04_tl         = The General Mahamatra of the Akademiya does not come to this part of the Sandproof Wall, but he is often seen these days. Between the Eremires, a scary legend about him is spreading across...

|vo_08_05_title      = 데히야에 대해…
|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Dehya]]
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Dehya.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = 데히야는 아루 마을에 묵을 때마다 도금 여단 부하들을 잘 관리해서 내 수고를 덜어줬어. 사실 데히야씨는, 털털한 모습과는 달리 아주 귀여운 사람이야
|vo_08_05_rm         = Dehiyaneun Aru Maeure mugeul ttaemada dogeum yeodan buhadeureul jal gwanrihaeseo nae sugoreul deoreojwosseo. Sasil Dehiya-ssineun, teolteolhan moseupgwaneun dalli aju gwiyeoun saramiya
|vo_08_05_tl         = Whenever Dehya stays in Aaru Village, she lessened my toils by taking care of her Eremite subordinates well. Actually, Ms. Dehya is a very cute person unlike her easy-going looks.

<!-- More About -->
|vo_09_01_title      = {name}에 대해 알기・첫 번째
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = 나에 대해 알고 싶어? 썩 좋은 이야기는 아니지만, 정 듣고 싶다면… 깊은 밤 모닥불 옆에서 얘기해줄게
|vo_09_01_rm         = Nae daehae algo sipeo? Sseok joeun iyagineun anijiman, jeong deutgo sipdamyeon... gipeun bam modakbul yeopeseo yaegihaejulge
|vo_09_01_tl         = You want to know about me? It isn't that pleasant of a story, but if you really want to hear it... I'll tell you beside the fireplace in a late night.

|vo_09_02_title      = {name}에 대해 알기・두 번째
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = 우리는 신의 가호를 잃은 일족이야. 거짓보단 어두운 미래야말로 우리의 진정한 적이지. 거짓을 품은 채로 가시밭길을 걷는 건… 이기적으로 진실을 품고 죽는 것보다 더 고상한 게 아닐까…
|vo_09_02_rm         = Urineun sin-ui gahoreul ireun iljogiya. Geojitbodan eoduun miraeyamallo uri-ui jinjeonghan jeogiji. Geojiseul pumeun chaero gasibatgireul geotneun geon... igijeogeuro jinsireul pumgo jukneun geotboda deo gosanghan ge anilkka...
|vo_09_02_tl         = We are a clan that has lost God's protection. Darker future than lies is our true enemy. Walking on a thorny path with lies... would be more noble than dying with selfishly knowing the truth...

|vo_09_03_title      = {name}에 대해 알기・세 번째
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 아직도 적왕이 부활할 것이라고 믿는 사람들이 있지만 그건 불가능해, 과거는 모래알과도 같아서 바람 따라 흩어지는 게 자연스럽지
|vo_09_03_rm         = Ajikdo jeogwang-i buhwalhal geosirago mitneun saramdeuri itjiman geugeon bulganeunghae, gwageoneun moraealgwado gataseo baram ttara heuteojineun ge jayeonseureopji
|vo_09_03_tl         = There are still people who believe the Red King will resurrect, but it's impossible. The past is like a grain of sand, so it's natural for it to scatter by the winds.

|vo_09_04_title      = {name}에 대해 알기・네 번째
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 내 방패? 아, 마을 밖 사람들의 말에 의하면, 이 방패에는 「벤누」의 축복이 깃들어 있어서 사막의 모래 자갈과 모래폭풍을 원하는 대로 부릴 수 있다지…. 외지인들의 망상일 뿐이지만, 어쨌든 나한테는… 잘 맞는 편이야
|vo_09_04_rm         = Nae bangpae? A, maeul bak saramdeul-ui mare uihamyeon, i bangpaeeneun "Bennu"ui chukbok-i gitdeureo isseoseo samak-ui morae jagalgwa moraepokpung'eul wonhaneun daero buril su itdaji.... Oejiindeul-ui mangsang'il ppunijiman, eojjaetdeun nahanteneun... jal matneun pyeoniya
|vo_09_04_tl         = My shield? Ah, from the people outside the village, this shield has the blessing of "Bennu", so it can control the sands and the sandstorms of the desert as it wants to... It's only an imagination of outlanders, but to me... it fits well.

|vo_09_05_title      = {name}에 대해 알기・다섯 번째
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 이 호박색 눈으로 네 미래를 보고 싶어…. 햇살 같기도 하고 황금 같기도 한 금색이겠지. 네 앞날이 순조롭기를 진심으로 축복할게
|vo_09_05_rm         = I hobaksaek nuneuro ne mirareul bogo sipeo.... Haetsal gatgido hago hwanggeum gatgido han geumsaegigetji. Ne apnal-i sunjoropgireul jinsimeuro chukbokhalge
|vo_09_05_tl         = I want to see your future with this amber eye... It would be like a golden color that is like sunshine or gold. I will bless you with all my heart that your future will go well.

<!-- Miscellany II -->
|vo_10_01_title      = {name}의 취미…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = 내 취미는 마을에서 산책하는 거야. 변함없는 마을을 보면 오늘이 항상 아름다웠던 과거처럼 느껴지거든
|vo_10_01_rm         = Nae chwimineun maeureseo sanchaekhaneun geoya. Byeonhameopneun maeureul bomyeon oneul-i hangsang areumdawotdeun gwageocheoreom neukkyeojigeodeun
|vo_10_01_tl         = My hobby is taking a walk in the village. When I look at the unchanging town, I feel like today is always a beautiful past.

|vo_10_02_title      = {name}의 고민…
|vo_10_02_friendship = 6
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = 가끔 주제를 모르는 악당들이 아루 마을의 평화를 파괴할 때가 있어. 녀석들을 마수가 득실대는 골짜기로 쫓아내는 건 너무 관대했나? 혹시 더 좋은 방법 있어?
|vo_10_02_rm         = Gakkeum jujereul moreuneun akdangdeul-i Aru Maeul-ui pyeonghwareul pagoehal ttaega isseo. Nyeoseokdeureul masuga deuksildaeneun goljjagiro jjochaneneun geon neomu gwandaehaetna? Hoksi deo joeun bangbeop isseo?
|vo_10_02_tl         = Sometimes villains that don't know their place destroy the peace of Aaru village. Was it too lenient to kick them out into a valley full of monsters? Do you perhaps know a better way?

|vo_10_03_title      = 좋아하는 음식…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = 음식은 질보다 양이 더 중요해… 사막에서 지내려면 많은 에너지가 필요하거든. 지친 하루의 마무리로 배불리 먹는 건 정말 행복한 일이지
|vo_10_03_rm         = Eumsigeun jilboda yang-i deo jung'yohae... samageseo jinaeryeomyeon maneun eneojiga piryohageodeun. Jichin haru-ui mamuriro baebulli meokneun geon jeongmal haengbokhan iriji
|vo_10_03_tl         = Quantity is more important than quality in terms of food... I need lots of energy to stay in the desert. Eating full for the finale of a tiring day is a very happy thing.

|vo_10_04_title      = 싫어하는 음식…
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = 생선이 싫은 건 아니지만 먹기 까다로운 것 같아. 사막에선 생선 먹을 일이 별로 없다 보니 가시를 바르는 게 서툴러서 부끄러운 모습을 보였네
|vo_10_04_rm         = Saengseoni sireun geon anijiman meokgi kkadaroun geot gata. Samageseon saengseon mogeul iri byeollo eopda boni gasireul bareuneun ge seotulleoseo bukkeureoun moseubeul boyeotne
|vo_10_04_tl         = It's not like I hate fish, but it seems complicated to eat. Since there aren't many occasions to eat fish in the desert, I showed you an embarrasing side of me because I'm not used to boning.

<!-- Receiving a Gift -->
|vo_10_05_title      = 선물 획득・첫 번째
|vo_10_05_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_10_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_10_05_tx         = 정말 맛있어. 이렇게 맛있는 음식을 준비하느라 고생 많았지?
|vo_10_05_rm         = Jeongmal masisseo. Ireoke masitneun eumsigeul junbihaneura gosaeng manatji?
|vo_10_05_tl         = It's really delicious. You must have done some hard work to prepare a food this tasty, right?

|vo_10_06_title      = 선물 획득・두 번째
|vo_10_06_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_10_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_10_06_tx         = 방랑하는 여행자의 음식에서 고향의 맛이 느껴지네
|vo_10_06_rm         = Bangranghaneun yeohaengja-ui eumsigeseo gohyang-ui masi neukkyeojine
|vo_10_06_tl         = From a wandering traveler's food, I can feel the taste of my hometown.

|vo_10_07_title      = 선물 획득・세 번째
|vo_10_07_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_10_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_10_07_tx         = 내 입맛이 너무 보수적인가 봐…
|vo_10_07_rm         = Nae ipmasi neomu bosujeoginga bwa...
|vo_10_07_tl         = My taste must be too conservative...

<!-- Birthday -->
|vo_11_01_title      = 생일…
|vo_11_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_11_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = 생일 축하해! 너는 오늘 태어났지, 태어났다는 건 정말 굉장한 일이야. 생일 소원이라도 있어? 네가 험한 곳으로 가고 싶으면 호위가 되어주고, 쉬고 싶으면 아루 마을에서 최고의 고기구이와 음료를 대접해줄게
|vo_11_01_rm         = Saeng'il chukhahae! Neoneun oneul taeeonatji, taeeonatdaneun geon jeongmal goengjanghan iriya. Saeng'il sowonirado isseo? Nega heomhan goseuro gago sipeumyeon howiga doeeojugo, swigo sipeumyeon Aru Maeureseo choego-ui gogiguiwa eumryoreul daejeophaejulge
|vo_11_01_tl         = Happy birthday! You were born today, being born is a great thing. Do you have a birthday wish? If you want to go to somewhere rough, I'll be your guard, and if you want to rest, I'll treat you the best meat and drinks in Aaru Village.

<!-- Feelings About Ascension -->
|vo_12_01_title      = 돌파의 느낌・기
|vo_12_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  01.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = 이 힘으로 더 많은 이들을 지킬 수 있다면…
|vo_12_01_rm         = I himeuro deo maneun ideureul jikil su itdamyeon...
|vo_12_01_tl         = Only if I could protect more people with this power...

|vo_12_02_title      = 돌파의 느낌・승
|vo_12_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_12_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_12_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  02.ogg
|vo_12_02_tx         = 모든 걸 막는 방패와 모든 걸 뚫는 창이라… 걱정 마, 시도해보진 않을게
|vo_12_02_rm         = Modeun geol makneun bangpaewa modeun geol ttulneun chang'ira... geokjeong ma, sidohaeboji anneulge
|vo_12_02_tl         = A shield that stops everything and a spear that pierces everything... don't worry, I won't try it.

|vo_12_03_title      = 돌파의 느낌・전
|vo_12_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_12_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_12_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  03.ogg
|vo_12_03_tx         = 사람들은 「현재」에서 힘을 얻어 「미래」의 불안에 대해 대비하려 하지. 내가 창술과 방패를 익힌 것도 지금의 평화를 수호하기 위해서야
|vo_12_03_rm         = Saramdeureun "Hyeonjae"eseo himeul eodeo "Mirae"ui burane daehae daebiharyeo haji. Naega changsulgwa bangpaereul ikhin geotdo jigeum-ui pyeonghwareul suhohagi wihaeseoya
|vo_12_03_tl         = People try to prepare for the anxiety of the "Future" by gaining strength from the "Present". The reason because I learned spearmanship and shields is to protect the peace of the present.

|vo_12_04_title      = 돌파의 느낌・결
|vo_12_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_12_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_12_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04.ogg
|vo_12_04_tx         = 지금의 난 네 앞에 닥칠 그 어떤 위험도 막아낼 수 있어. 그러니까 날 믿으면 두 눈을 감고 적을 맡겨만 줘
|vo_12_04_rm         = Jigeum-ui nan ne ape dakchil geu eotteon wiheomdo maganael su isseo. Geureonikka nal mideumyeon du nuneul gamgo jeogeul matgyeoman jwo
|vo_12_04_tl         = I can stop any danger that will reach you now. So if you trust me, close your eyes and let me take care of the enemies.
}}
